topic.title: Upgrading Your HTTP Floating License Server

body.p: The goal of the following procedure is to help you minimize the downtime when you upgrade the HTTP floating license server to its latest version.

Follow this procedure:
Access the license server by following the link provided by the Tomcat Web Application Manager page. If prompted for authentication, use the admin or manager credentials.
Click the View license key link and copy the displayed license key to a file for later use.
Go to the Tomcat Web Application Manager page, log in with the user you configured with the manager role, and Undeploy the floating license server.
Go to website and download the HTTP license server.
Deploy the downloaded license server.
Access the license server by following the link provided by the Tomcat Web Application Manager page. If prompted for authentication, use the credentials configured for the admin or manager users.
Paste the license key into the form and register it.
